Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the reappointment by the Mayor of PABLO E. VENGOECHEA of Staten Island as a member of the Landmarks Preservation Commission

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections to which was referred on February 7, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, the  Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the reappointment by the Mayor of PABLO E. VENGOECHEA of Staten Island, as a member of the Landmarks Preservation Commission, for a term to expire on June 28, 2003.

Res. 1767

PRESERVATION COMMISSION

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the reappointment by the Mayor of PABLO E. VENGOECHEA of Staten Island, as a member of the Landmarks Preservation Commission for a term to expire on June 28, 2003.

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the reappointment by the Mayor of JAN HIRD POKORNY of Manhattan as a member of the Landmarks Preservation Commission

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections to which was referred on February 7, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the reappointment by the Mayor of JAN HIRD POKORNY of Manhattan, as a member of the Landmarks Preservation Commission for a term to expire on June 28, 2001.

Res. 1771

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE REAPPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF JAN HIRD POKORNY OF MANHATTAN AS A MEMBER OF THE LANDMARKS PRESERVATION COMMISSION

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the reappointment by the Mayor of JAN HIRD POKORNY of Manhattan, as a member of the Landmarks Preservation Commission for a term to expire on June 28, 2001.
Items.MatterName: M 1058 - Jan Hird Pokorny, Reappointment, Landmarks Preservation Commission

Items.MatterName: Jan Hird Pokorny, Reappointment, Landmarks Preservation Commission
